CustomField.formula: If(NOT(ISBLANK(Transfer_Amount__c)), Transfer_Amount__r.Name, If(NOT(ISBLANK(Registration_Payment_Account__c)), Registration_Payment_Account__r.Name, If(NOT(ISBLANK(Demand__c)), Demand__r.Name, If(NOT(ISBLANK(Receipt__c)), Receipt__r.Name, ''))))
CustomField.label: Document No.
